Custom VIP 2022 Spanish Grand Prix Packages

Allow us to curate a complete luxury travel experience for you, including your preferred tickets, to this thrilling race and beloved Spanish city. Our specialty is bespoke luxury travel packages and we have some wonderful options available for this highly sought-after event. We’ll work with you to customize your perfect 2022 Spanish Grand Prix experience with first class accommodations and preferred race viewing options. Choose premium grandstand seating or upgrade to team hospitality with all of its upscale perks including gourmet food and drink, prime views of the track, and exclusive access including pit tours and driver appearances.

Our personalized 2022 Spanish Grand Prix packages are available from $5,095 per person (premium grandstand seating) or $12,595 (exclusive hospitality) per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2022 Spanish Grand Prix

The Spanish Grand Prix has been held annually since 1986, though its history dates back to 1923. This popular race takes place on the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya, one of the most diverse courses on the tour. Because the track features every type of corner, the track is often utilized by teams for winter testing. Its home city of Barcelona boasts a temperate climate, gorgeous beaches, and an abundance of art and history, making it a hot destination for travelers from all over the world.
